```{r pancreas 31869246, include=FALSE}

PMID_31869246 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('31869246', database = 'PubMed')

citation_31869246 <- paste0(PMID_31869246$journal,' ', PMID_31869246$year, ' ', PMID_31869246$month,';', PMID_31869246$volume,'(', PMID_31869246$number,'):', PMID_31869246$pages)

PubMed_31869246 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_31869246$eprint)

doi_31869246 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_31869246$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
